text: The Wright Meridian was a single-decker body of a bus. It had a low floor. It was made from 2007 to 2009 by Wrightbus. The Wright Meridian body was built on the MAN NL273F chassis. The first production vehicle was made as a demonstrator in October 2007. In 2008, Whitelaw's Coaches of Stonehouse purchased the production bus and also ordered five more Meridians. In 2008, Newbury Buses ordered 2 Meridians. In 2009, South Lancs Travel ordered 4 Meridians. In 2009, Premiere Travel of Nottingham ordered 2 Meridians. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Low-entry buses Category:Low-floor buses Meridian
title: Wright Meridian
